subject: Marathon Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Nineteen of Ryan Shay’s former Notre Dame cross-country teammates will run in the New York City Marathon to honor the runner who died from a heart attack during the United States Olympic trials last year.
snippet: Nineteen of Ryan Shay’s former Notre Dame cross-country teammates will run in the New York City Marathon to honor the runner who died from a heart attack during the United States Olympic trials last year.
